docs.text: NOMAD Learning Roadmap ¶ 🟢 I'm new to NOMAD, where should I start? ¶ Create an account: Onboarding Workshop: Create Account YouTube Tutorials: Tutorial 1: Introduction to NOMAD Introduction to NOMAD GUI: YouTube Tutorials: Tutorial 16: NOMAD GUI Overview 📂 How can I upload data? ¶ YouTube Tutorials: Tutorial 1: Uploading Data to NOMAD Tutorial 16: Upload Raw Data Files Onboarding Workshop: Upload Data Documentation: How to Upload Data NOMAD Docs Develop - Upload & Publish Uploading Experimental (NeXus) Files: FAIRmat Tutorial 16 Documentation: Upload Raw Data Files YouTube Tutorials: Tutorial 16: Uploading NeXus Files 🚀 How do I publish data and get a DOI? ¶ YouTube Tutorials: Tutorial 1: Publishing Data and Getting a DOI FAIRmat Tutorial 16 Documentation: Create a Dataset Documentation: Publish and Get a DOI NOMAD Docs Develop - Upload & Publish 📑 Which file formats does NOMAD recognize? ¶ Documentation: Supported File Formats FAIRmat Tutorial 16: Upload Raw Data Files 🔎 How can I explore data in NOMAD? ¶ YouTube Tutorials: Tutorial 1: Exploring Data in NOMAD Tutorial 16: Explore Data Records FAIRmat Tutorial 16 Documentation: Explore Data Records Onboarding Workshop: Explore Tab Inspect Entries Customized Search Dashboard Explore Use Cases NOMAD Docs Develop: Explore Data 💻 How can I use NOMAD's API?
